desc: We use recycled fabrics to produce our range of swim shorts, which come in two styles and are delivered in a free travel pouch. The range features bold hand drawn prints and classic plains. O&B also offer Shirts, T-Shirts, Loungewear and Underwear.

layout.text:
ALL STYLES NOW AVAILABLE IN REGULAR AND SHORT LENGTH
MADE FROM RECYCLED FABRICS & QUICK DRY TECHNOLOGY
